tool.name: pl.sim

configfiles.configfile:
import scanpy.api as sc @CMD_set_figure_params
sc.pl.sim( as_heatmap = '$as_heatmap', tmax_realization = '$tmax_realization', shuffle = '$shuffle', save = '$save', show = '$show',)

param.name: tmax_realization
param.label: tmax_realization
param.help: Number of observations in one realization of the time series. The data matrix adata.X consists in concatenated realizations.

param.name: save
param.label: save
param.help: If `True` or a `str`, save the figure. A string is appended to the default filename. Infer the filetype if ending on {{'.pdf', '.png', '.svg'}}.

param.name: show
param.label: show
param.help: Show the plot, do not return axis.

tool.help:
Plot results of simulation.
Parameters ---------- as_heatmap : bool (default: False) Plot the timeseries as heatmap. tmax_realization : int or None (default: False) Number of observations in one realization of the time series. The data matrix adata.X consists in concatenated realizations. shuffle : bool, optional (default: False) Shuffle the data. save : `bool` or `str`, optional (default: `None`) If `True` or a `str`, save the figure. A string is appended to the default filename. Infer the filetype if ending on {{'.pdf', '.png', '.svg'}}. show : bool, optional (default: `None`) Show the plot, do not return axis.
